channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 07:27 Alarm lifted in Poltava region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🟢 07:27 Alarm lifted in Poltava region. Follow further messages. #Poltava_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 06:51 The threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community has been eliminated. Follow the news for further updates.
item.description: 🟢 06:51 The threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community has been eliminated. Follow the news for further updates. #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 05:29 Alarm repulse in Dnipropetrovsk oblast. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Marganets and Marganets territorial community- Myrivsk territorial community- Nikopol city and Nikopol territorial community- Chervonogrigorivska territorial community
item.description: 🟡 05:29 Alarm repulse in Dnipropetrovsk oblast.
